title: Fort Matanzas National Monument: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       All areas of the park are free of charge including the ferry to the fort. However, you must stop in the Visitor Center to get your free boarding pass for the ferry. Information about the Interagency Lands Passes is located here and you may purchase or have them issued at the Castillo de San Marcos National Monument in St. Augustine, approximately 14 miles north on A1A.
